title: PUBLIC SUPPLY - Sans serif - FONT ID
content:
Looking for an ID on this simple sans serif used for 'Public Supply' branding collateral.

Many thanks in advance for any help!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022555im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3-books-stacked-black-9U_4327.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3-books-stacked-black-9U.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022555/http:/typophile.com/files/3-books-stacked-black-9U.jpg) | 307 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Looks like it could be either [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022555/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/) or [News Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022555/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/news-gothic/), based on the shape of the 6 and 9.
